Ubuntu 10 Install

 # Install the base deps
{{{
$ sudo aptitude install rng-tools postgresql apache2 apache2-threaded-dev gcc make libexpat-dev libapache2-mod-perl2 libclass-dbi-perl libdigest-sha1-perl libnet-cidr-perl libossp-uuid-perl libxml-libxml-perl libxml2-dev libmodule-install-perl libapache2-request-perl libdbd-pg-perl bind9 libregexp-common-perl libxml-rss-perl libapache2-mod-gnutls libapreq2-dev libjson-perl rsync libunicode-string-perl
}}}
 # Install the remaining CPAN modules
{{{
$ sudo perl -MCPAN -e 'install Net::Abuse::Utils,XML::Compile,XML::IODEF,XML::Malware,DateTime::Format::DateParse, Regexp::Common::net::CIDR,Apache2::REST,CIF::WebAPI,Text::Table'
}}}
 # Modify your postgres config
{{{
$ diff -u pg_hba.conf.orig pg_hba.conf
--- pg_hba.conf.orig	2010-09-02 12:06:29.000000000 +0000
+++ pg_hba.conf	2010-09-02 12:21:43.000000000 +0000
@@ -71,13 +71,13 @@
 # (autovacuum, daily cronjob, replication, and similar tasks).
 #
 # Database administrative login by UNIX sockets
-local   all         postgres                          ident sameuser
+local   all         postgres                          trust 
 
 # TYPE  DATABASE    USER        CIDR-ADDRESS          METHOD
 
 # "local" is for Unix domain socket connections only
-local   all         all                               ident sameuser
+local   all         all                               trust 
 # IPv4 local connections:
-host    all         all         127.0.0.1/32          md5
+host    all         all         127.0.0.1/32          trust
 # IPv6 local connections:
-host    all         all         ::1/128               md5
+host    all         all         ::1/128               trust
}}}
 # reload postgres
{{{
$ sudo /etc/init.d/postgresql reload
}}}
 # enable apreq and ssl for apache
{{{
$ sudo a2enmod apreq ssl
}}}
